title: My Google photos will not update it just constantly loads never letting me update
content: I have tried clearing the cash I have even gone to the extreme of clearing the storage I tried to back up all of my photos and force stop it to just get the update to load but it will not load no matter what I do I've left it on the loading screen for more than 30 minutes without it completing loading for me to update it when I go directly to the app in the app store it says something went wrong try again no matter how many times I go about it or try it in whatever different way it will not let me update Google photos
